text: Kelly Hall Tarn is a pool in Cumbria, England, to the west of Coniston Water. It is located about one km south-south-east of the village of Torver, on Torver Back Common.Lake District: Low Level and Lake Walks By Vivienne Crow Its name is said to be derived from a nearby building that has since disappeared. The location offers excellent views of the Old Man of Coniston. title: Kelly Hall Tarn
